notices.message: Application deadline for Spring 2024 intake is approaching soon.
Your application has been moved to the 'In Review' stage.
Don't forget to upload your financial documents for verification.
New updates available for your selected program's curriculum.
The university interview schedule has been posted. Please check your email.
Your payment for the application is still pending. Please complete it to proceed.
New scholarship opportunities have been announced for international students.
You have successfully submitted all required documents.
Your application fee payment has been received.
The visa application process will begin soon. Stay tuned for updates.
One of your documents requires resubmission due to a missing signature.
Your application has been forwarded to the admissions committee.
Please provide proof of your English language proficiency for final review.
Housing options have been updated for international students. Check the portal for details.
Your application decision will be announced next week. Good luck!
